text: I have interacted with this sign. It says nothing important
I don’t need to go this way! there are more important things to do
All in a good days work. I should go investigate what that noise was in the distance.
I need to get back to the farm and do my chores - not wander off irresponsibly!
Please Help Me! This bandit is attacking us. There's a sword there that I have no idea how to use. Maybe you can fend him off!
I had no Idea I could use things other than farm tools. That felt… weird
